description: A wire container made for transporting chickens, but you can use it to hold any tiny animal.  Use it on a suitable animal to capture, use it on an empty tile to release.
This is a small whistle.  When used, it produces a high tone that causes nearby friendly dogs to either follow you closely and stop attacking, or start attacking enemies if they are currently docile.
A saddle, bridle, and associated tack that can be placed on a tamed animal that is capable of being ridden.
A plastic container meant to hold pets for transport.  Use it on a suitable animal to capture, use it on an empty tile to release.
